title: Eternum LFM [Bronze/Silver] [Top/Support/Mid]
body:
Hi there! Want to play with a team and rank up? Sick of getting teams that you have to carry?
Feel free to add me in-game to play with Eternum. Looking for people willing to pick for the team composition and work with the team in general.

Current positions, Top/Mid.

If you'd like to be added leave your response below in the following format

_IGN:
Role:
Champions Mained:
Champions You Can Play:
Skype:_

replies.body:
IGN: RedNalick
Role: Support
Champions Mained: Thresh, Braum, Nami
Champions you can play: Pretty much any support.
Skype: red.nalick

IGN: whitepumah
Role: top/mid/support
Champions Mained: janna/zilean/orianna
Champions You Can Play: All
Skype: whitepumah
